name: SimplySiti Simply Elegant Liquid Eye Liner 01 Black
description: A Bold and Elegant Look, anti-smudging.
details:
How to Use: Begin at the inner corner of the eye along the lash line and work outwards.Position brush tip close to the last roots, and gently move brush along the natural curve of lash line.

Ingredients: Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Glycerine, CI 77266, Triethanolamine, PVP, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Stearate, Methylisothiazolinone, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate
long_description: A 24 hours extended eyeliner that creates a bold and elegant look without smudging. Highly concentrated pigments allows for precise, consistent and intense drama.

name: Genuine Lenovo PA10400 Power Bank 10400mAh with 2 USB Port (Black and White)
description: PA10400 is a Lenovo brand power bank. It provides two USB output ports (5V/2.1A * 2), and is able to charge your phone and tablet devices at the same time.
details:
Electrical Specifications

Battery capacity：10400mAh(4cells  18650 2600mAh battery inside)
input：micro USB 5V/2A
output：USB 5V/2.1A

 


Physical Specifications 

Product size：140.5x63.7x21.6mm
Product weight：246.8g
Brown box size：181*131*37mm
Gross Weight：342.2g
Box size：393*275*198mm
long_description:
Key Features:
- Larger capacity (Battery capacity up to 10400mAh)
- Quick charging (Up to 5V/2A input)
- 2 ports 5V/2.1A output with auto sensing
- High-quality battery cell（LG 18650 lithium）, Recharge cycles up to 500 times
- Intelligent multiple protection design (OCP/OVP/OTP)

name: CHAMPS C LYSINE 100'S*2
description: CHAMPS Vitamin C with Lysine with Fruity Flavor Button-Shaped Tablets
details:
Lysine is one of the numerous amino acids that the body needs for growth and tissue repair. Like all amino acids, lysine functions as a building block for protein. It is also important in the production of various enzymes and disease fighting antibodies. Vitamin C is needed to convert lysine into hydroxylysine, which is then incorporated into collagen. 

Champs C with Lysine is a supplement with added Lysine, suitable for children 12 years old and below.

Shape / Flavour:
Button-shaped Tablets/ Fruity.

Active Ingredients:
Acid Ascorbic 100mg. 
Lysine Hydrochloride 50 mg. 

Dosage: 
Above 1 year of age, 1 to 2 tablets daily or as directed by physicians.

Pack Size :
100 Tablets x 2

name: CHAMPS C STRAWBERRY 100'S*2
description: CHAMPS C Chewable Strawberry Flavoured Vitamin C Supplements
details:
Ascorbic acid or vitamin C is found especially in oranges, lemons, limes, grapes, leafy green vegetables and potatoes. Daily intake is essential because it has the highest daily requirement of any vitamin. 

Champs Vitamin C with strawberry flavour is suitable for children 12 years old and below. 

Direction for Use: 1 to 3 tablets daily. CHAMPS C tastes best when it is chewed.

Ingredients: Vitamin C 100mg

Contra Indication: There are no known contraindications. However, if in doubt of the suitability of this product, please consult your doctor or pharmacist before taking the product.

name: PURE HERB MISAI KUCHING 30'S
description: Pure Herb Organic Herbal Tea good for managing ailments like diabetes, high blood pressure and gout.
details:
For generations, native communities in South East Asia have benefited from the goodness of Misai Kuching (Orthosiphon Stamineus). With its validated health benefits, it is consumed daily as a superior tea with a delightful taste.

Pure Herb Misai Kuching organic herbal tea is caffeine free and does not contain artificial coloring, additives or preservatives. 

It is organically grown without the use of chemical fertilizer, pesticide or herbicide. It is also hygienically processed, thus making it a 100% pure and natural product. 

Therefore adults or children can safely consume Pure Herb misai kuching organic herbal tea on a daily basis.

Pure Herb, the original manufacturer of Misai Kuching only uses 100% natural ingredients and is dedicated to ensure quality is at it's best at all times.

THE TRADITIONAL WAY TO GOOD HEALTH!

name: ONE Q GUMMY VITAMIN C 30G*15 POUCH
description:
One Q Gummy with Vitamin C 40mg (Tom & Jerry - 10gummies + 5 gummies x 15 sachets/box)
With delicious flavours
details:
One Q Gummy with Vitamin C 40mg (10gummies + 5 gummies x 15 Pack)

One Q Gummy with Vitamin C 40mg is a delicious gummy for children who needs a daily supplementation of vitamin C. It is rich in vitamin C for strengthening the immune system and supporting children's growth.

Vitamin C is a water-soluble vitamin , it cannot be stored by the body and therefore must be replenished daily.

Vitamin C in food will be easily destroyed or lost during cooking, storage or processing.

Picky eaters with low intake of fruits and vegetables do not get adequate Vitamin C.

 

Tolerable Upper Intake Level:
Children 1-3 years : 400mg
Children 4-8 years : 650mg
Children 9-13 years : 1200mg

name: CHAMPS C SUGAR FREE 100'S
description: CHAMPS Sugar-Free Vitamin C Supplement Tablets.
details:
Ascorbic acid or vitamin C is found especially in oranges, lemons, limes, grapes, leafy green vegetables and potatoes. Daily intake is essential because it has the highest daily requirement of any vitamin. 

Champs Vitamin C is a sugar free supplement for Vitamin C deficiency suitable for children 12 years old and below. 

Direction for Use: 1 to 3 tablets daily. CHAMPS C tastes best when it is chewed.

Ingredients: Vitamin C 100mg

Contra Indication: There are no known contraindications. However, if in doubt of the suitability of this product, please consult your doctor or pharmacist before taking the product.

Lysine is one of the numerous amino acids that the body needs for growth and tissue repair. Like all amino acids, lysine functions as a building block for protein. It is also important in the production of various enzymes and disease fighting antibodies. Vitamin C is needed to convert lysine into hydroxylysine, which is then incorporated into collagen.

name: SimplySiti LC 19 Absolute Matte Percayalah
description: A long-lasting matte finish with easy & comfortable wear - SPF 15.
details:
How to Use: Apply directly on the lips or by using a brush applicator.

Ingredients: Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Triethylhexanoin, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Ceresin, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite,  Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, BHT, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glycerin. May contain (+/-): CI 15850, CI 19140:1, CI 15850:1, CI 77492, Cl 77499, Titanium Dioxide, Mica, Ultramarines, CI 77491, CI 45410, Iron Oxide, Carmine, Tin Oxide
long_description:
Express your most elegant & sophisticated pout with an array of breath-taking colours.

Provides long-lasting matte finishing with easy & comfortable wear with SPF 15

name: SimplySiti LC 08 Ultra Moist Cinta Ini
description: A long-lasting matte finish with easy & comfortable wear - SPF 15.
details:
How to Use: Apply directly on the lips or by using a brush applicator.

Ingredients: Hydrogenated Polydecene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polybutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Ceresin, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyethylene, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Microcrystalline Wax, Silica, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, BHT, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glycerin. May contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide, Mica, CI 15850, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77489, CI 77499, Ultramarines, CI 15850:1, CI 19140:1, CI 45410, Tin Oxide
long_description:
Express your most elegant & sophisticated pout with an array of breath-taking colours.

Moisturizes & nourishes your lips to perfection. SPF 15
